title: Batting Skills
description: Improve batting technique, shot selection, and confidence through guided practice.

title: Fast Bowling Basics
description: Learn the key elements of fast bowling, including run-up, action, and seam control.

title: Spin Bowling Training
description: Understand spin fundamentals with focused drills on grip, release, and accuracy.

title: Fitness & Fielding
description: Build cricket fitness, improve fielding agility, and learn wicket-keeping essentials.

title: Match Situations
description: Practice real-game scenarios to develop decision-making and teamwork under pressure.

title: Video Review Feedback
description: Get personalized feedback through video review to improve your overall performance.

title: Strategy & Technical Drills
description: Learn on-field tactics and complete drills to sharpen your technical cricket skills.

title: Centre Wicket Practice
description: Train on the main centre wicket to experience real match-like conditions.
